segment.source: How to Set MED-V Workspace Deletion Options
segment.target: How to Set MED-V Workspace Deletion Options

segment.source: How to Set MED-V Workspace Deletion Options
segment.target: How to Set MED-V Workspace Deletion Options

segment.source: How to Set MED-V Workspace Deletion Options
segment.target: How to Set MED-V Workspace Deletion Options

segment.source: The administrator can set the MED-V workspace deletion options for each user or group so that the MED-V workspace is automatically deleted under certain conditions.
segment.target: The administrator can set the MED-V workspace deletion options for each user or group so that the MED-V workspace is automatically deleted under certain conditions.

segment.source: To set MED-V workspace deletion options
segment.target: To set MED-V workspace deletion options

segment.source: In the Deployment pane, click Workspace deletion options.
segment.target: In the Deployment pane, click Workspace deletion options.

segment.source: In the Workspace Deletion Options dialog box, select from the following options:
segment.target: In the Workspace Deletion Options dialog box, select from the following options:

segment.source: The Workspace has been disabled—If the administrator disables the MED-V workspace, the MED-V workspace is deleted from the user or group computer.
segment.target: The Workspace has been disabled—If the administrator disables the MED-V workspace, the MED-V workspace is deleted from the user or group computer.

segment.source: The Workspace has expired—If the MED-V workspace expires according to the date specified, the MED-V workspace is deleted from the user or group computer.
segment.target: The Workspace has expired—If the MED-V workspace expires according to the date specified, the MED-V workspace is deleted from the user or group computer.

segment.source: User is offline for more than the allowed period—If the policy is not refreshed in the time period specified since the user was offline, the MED-V workspace is deleted from the user or group computer.
segment.target: User is offline for more than the allowed period—If the policy is not refreshed in the time period specified since the user was offline, the MED-V workspace is deleted from the user or group computer.

segment.source: How to Configure a Domain User or Group
segment.target: How to Configure a Domain User or Group
